page.title: 13TWO FACTORIES - HAMPTON HILL
page.content: Work shops are not a prominent feature in this area which is largely residential. However we discovered two in Hampton Hill 1. ABC ENGINEERING make hydraulic components of steel. Handsaws are used for cutting steel. Goods are mainly sent to local outlets.300 pieces are made daily by 7 workers who get to work mainly by public transport or walking to the factory. Reported to be in decline and not a good place for young people wanting jobs. 2.LONGFORD TOOLS LTD. makes press tools of steel produced by British Steel Corporation. A lathe is used and goods are sent worldwide. 12 pieces are produced each month by 6 shop floor workers and 1 office clerk. They get to work by cycling. THE MALL SCHOOL
